Viyé Diba (amụrụ n'afọ 1954) bụ onye Senegal na-eme ihe nkiri, ntinye ihe, na arụmọrụ. A maara ya maka iji ihe ndị a chọtara, mpaghara, ndị a na-ejighị n'aka, na ndị a rụgharịrị arụgharị n'ọrụ ya, na-egosipụta mmasị ya na isiokwu gburugburu ebe obibi. A gụnyere ọrụ Diba n'ọtụtụ ihe ngosi mba ụwa, nke gụnyere DakāArt, Johannesburg Biennale, na Biennale dābidjan, ma gosipụta ya na ihe ngosi onwe ya na National Gallery na Dakar, Senegal. Enwere ike ịhụ ọrụ ya na North Carolina Museum of Art, Brooklyn Museum, na National Museum of African Art na Washington, D.C.

Diba nwetara nzere bachelọ na nka mara mma na National School of Fine Arts na Dakar, Senegal na 1979, nke soro ya bu inweta nzere afọ anọ ọzọ na agụmakwụkwọ nka na National School nke nka nke Senegal, kwa na Dakar
Diba nwetakwara PhD na Urban Geography site na Mahadum Nice na Nice, France, ebe edemede ya jiri mmetụta nke ọrụ mmadụ na gburugburu ebe obibi nke Dakar tụnyere nke Nice.
Ọrụ Diba dị ka onye na-ese ihe malitere na 1980s

Ọ bụ ezie na ọrụ mbụ ya bụ ihe atụ, ọrụ Diba mechara jiri echiche kọwaa ụdị anya nke nka "ọdịnala" Africa na ịchọpụta ihe onwunwe nke oghere obodo. N'afọ 1998, e nyere ya Grand Prize na Dak'Art Biennial n'afọ 1998 maka Echappement, ọrụ mgbasa ozi na-agwakọta na canvas. Diba jere ozi dị ka prọfesọ nke nka anya na National School of Fine Arts nke Senegal kemgbe 1986.
